name: Space Party: Star Dozer
description:
Explore our Galaxy on the best coin pusher machine ever!

Space Party offers the most exciting, fast-paced, action oriented coin experience in the universe! Fly through the galaxy while collecting rare prizes, completing quests, and cashing in on your coin stash! Take a break from your star travels and play our wheel of fortune and slot mini-games for amazing prizes and bonuses!

Space Party features:

- Dozens of rare cosmic prizes to collect!
- Monthly live events and special characters!
- Top-notch 3D graphics for a lively space experience
- Special quests where everything you collect helps unlock upgrades
- Superb physics, special effects and animations that light up your screen
- Magic chips with unique pusher powers that can be upgraded
- Party Slots: Our slot machine mini-game to win tons of prizes
- Spin the Fortune Wheel to win special rewards
- Compete on leaderboards and unlock achievements
- Look out for awesome new updates!

Develop yourself into a space conqueror in this roaring space adventure. Coins are falling on the table, get your spaceship and be there!

For support please contact coinparty@mindstormstudios.com

Visit our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/coinparty and join our active community of players!
